title: Discord Invite Link
body:
I had a friend that was sending out this discord link, discord.gg/AuTw9KV, and looking at a post 2 months ago it seems to be the same issue. He was not at his computer at the time.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/0EKbpqq1-discord-invite-hack 
I've already changed my passwords but I'm concerned that more people might fall for this. In that post the servers name was The Sewer but now from this link its The Jungle so I believe they were done similarly or by the same person.

replies.body: I don't have a a mobile app account, that I know of, unless it automatically makes one when you make a LoL account
Same here; immediately changed my password.  Submitted a trouble ticket today as well.
Same link was send out from my client as well as a friends client. Please upvote for visibility, we need a fix for this as soon as possible.

Hmmmmm I'm not sure what might be going on with that discord link, but there's not a lot we can do to stop people from creating discord servers. My best advice for your account security is to reach out to our account's team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure nothing else still has access to your account.

EDIT: I'd also probably suggest ignoring any random links you might be sent unless you know what you're clicking on. If these discord servers are bothersome, you can always report them to Discord's support.

It's not the discord link that bothers me, it's the fact that the link was sent from my client to everyone on my friends list without me touching the league client. I was even logged in, playing another game when the message sound started ringing multiple times while this message was sent. No one else has my password, this must be a vulnerability in the client.

Ahaaaaa this gives a lot of insight into what's actually happening, thank you!!! 

Since you were actively signed into the client when this happened, it means someone had your login info and was using the mobile app most likely. Please reach out to our account recovery team to see what could be done to get them signed out of the mobile app, as well as getting your password updated.

UPDATE: I was able to push through a change that might have been able to forcibly sign other people out of the mobile app as well. Hopefully this worked, but please still go ahead and submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if this is happening to you as well!

Thanks Broporo, hopefully this resolves the issue. However, I am fairly certain no one had my login info, as I never shared my login info, and I am certain haven't clicked on any scam links. I have submitted a ticket to see what else can be done/what information can be gathered. Thanks again for the response.

replies.body: Same exact link was sent from my account while my computer was off.  Changed password but hopefully nothing else was affected.
Same link was went out from me. I changed my password.

Same happened to me, i didn't click to any link or scam site, i didn't shared my account info, such as password, mail or account name, i didn't add anyone and my account 7 or 10 days ago sended the same link to all my friendlist, i submitted a ticket and Riot told me that no one got access to my account, i changed my password in the meanwhile. 

Someone discovered a way to spam with any LoL account without having access to it OR he got access of the Riot Server (?) OR there's a vulnerability of the client related with the message system.

I'm asking to Riot to look for this and find a solution for all of us
